user.title: Configure PSKReporter Monitor

init.title: PSKReporter Options
init.description: Configure filtering options for spot data

data_description.min_distance: Only show spots beyond this distance (0 = no minimum)
data_description.max_distance: Only show spots within this distance (0 = no maximum)
data_description.mode_filter: Only show spots using these modes (empty = all modes)
